data.title: Ben Moody on LinkedIn: Thanks for coming out Damany!
data.text:
🚀 Exciting News! 🚀 I'll be attending KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America in Chicago from November 6th to 9th! 🌟 This incredible event promises to be a hub of innovation and networking for the CNCF community, and I can't wait to share multiple product offerings by Red Hat. If you're looking to connect with me, you can find me at the Red Hat Booth #B2 and make sure to visit the Showcase Pavilion and explore a world of cutting-edge tech. You'll also find me at co-located events like #BackstageCon, #AppDeveloperCon, and #OpenShift Commons. These gatherings promise to be a goldmine of knowledge and connections. ✅ Expert Insights: Get the latest insights from Red Hat's thought leaders and see how their cloud-native technologies can drive your organization's success. ✅ Networking & Collaborations: Join us for in-depth discussions, live demos, and interactive sessions around #Backstage, Quarkusio, #Knative offerings Feel free to reach out if you'd like to schedule a meetup or chat about any exciting developments in the cloud-native landscape from Red Hat. Can't wait to see you in Chicago! #KubeCon #CloudNativeCon #CNCF #Chicago #RedHat #Networking #Innovation #TechCommunity

What if your team could feel like they're in the same room, even when they're miles apart? With Jive's connectivity features, this isn't a hypothetical question. Here's how Jive can help you turn a dispersed organisation into a close-knit community: 👥 People Directory: Jive is the ultimate corporate directory: quickly identify experts, locate potential collaborators and learn all about colleagues, including their skills, endorsements and mutual connections. 🌐 Social Networking Liking, following, @mentions, activity streams, status updates and real-time notifications help users make rapid connections and stay updated on what matters. 🔄 User Sync Build the ultimate employee directory by importing information from external personnel systems into Jive. It's time to reimagine how we connect. Jive brings the future of work to your organization with an open, easy-to-use environment that provides cohesive collaboration across your people and systems.

🚀 Exciting Tech Panel Alert! 🚀 This Thursday, 2/8, I'll be moderating a dynamic tech panel at Trailhead, and trust me, you won't want to miss it! 🌐💡 A little more about the event.... Picture this: an XR expert, an AI/cybersecurity guru, and a robotics maestro walk into a bar, not for a drink, but to dive deep into the ever-evolving world of tech! 🤖🚀 We're shaking things up with a 30-minute session packed with rapid-fire Q&A. These three experts will face lightning-round questions, from yes/no to this/that, and share industry-specific insights in just 30 seconds! 🕒💬 But here's the best part - YOU get to be a part of the action! 🎉 Send in your burning questions in advance to Annie.Morley@intracon.com, and if time allows, we'll field a few from the audience. 🙌 This is your chance to dive into the minds of tech leaders from diverse domains. Let's keep it fast, fun, and full of energy! See you there! 🔥 #TechPanel #TrailheadTechTalk #XR #AI #Robotics #TechLeadership #Innovation #NetworkingOpportunity
